book.description: 63-2JN-asv.sfm The American Standard Version of the Holy Bible (1901) Tuesday, September 12, 2006

contents.verseText: The elder unto the elect lady and her children, whom I love in truth; and not I only, but also all they that know the truth;
contents: The elder unto the elect lady and her children, whom I love in truth; and not I only, but also all they that know the
truth;

contents.verseText: for the truth’s sake which abideth in us, and it shall be with us for ever:
contents: for the truth’s sake which abideth in us, and it shall be with us for ever:

contents.verseText: Grace, mercy, peace shall be with us, from God the Father, and from Jesus Christ, the Son of the Father, in truth and love.
contents: Grace, mercy, peace shall be with us, from God the Father, and from Jesus Christ, the Son of the Father, in truth and
love.

contents.verseText: I rejoice greatly that I have found certain of thy children walking in truth, even as we received commandment from the Father.
contents: I rejoice greatly that I have found
of thy children walking in truth, even as we received commandment
from the Father.

contents.verseText: And now I beseech thee, lady, not as though I wrote to thee a new commandment, but that which we had from the beginning, that we love one another.
contents: And now I beseech thee, lady, not as though I wrote to thee a new commandment, but that which we had from the beginning,
that we love one another.

contents.verseText: And this is love, that we should walk after his commandments. This is the commandment, even as ye heard from the beginning, that ye should walk in it.
contents: And this is love, that we should walk after his commandments. This is the commandment, even as ye heard from the
beginning, that ye should walk in it.

contents.verseText: For many deceivers are gone forth into the world, even they that confess not that Jesus Christ cometh in the flesh. This is the deceiver and the anti-christ.
contents: For many deceivers are gone forth into the world,
they that confess not that Jesus Christ cometh in the
flesh. This is the deceiver and the anti-christ.

contents.verseText: Look to yourselves, that ye lose not the things which we have wrought, but that ye receive a full reward.
contents: Look to yourselves, that ye lose not the things which we have wrought, but that ye receive a full reward.

contents.verseText: Whosoever goeth onward and abideth not in the teaching of Christ, hath not God: he that abideth in the teaching, the same hath both the Father and the Son.
contents: Whosoever goeth onward and abideth not in the teaching of Christ, hath not God: he that abideth in the teaching, the same
hath both the Father and the Son.

contents.verseText: If any one cometh unto you, and bringeth not this teaching, receive him not into your house, and give him no greeting:
contents: If any one cometh unto you, and bringeth not this teaching, receive him not into
house, and give him no greeting:

contents.verseText: for he that giveth him greeting partaketh in his evil works.
contents: for he that giveth him greeting partaketh in his evil works.

contents.verseText: Having many things to write unto you, I would not write them with paper and ink: but I hope to come unto you, and to speak face to face, that your joy may be made full.
contents: Having many things to write unto you, I would not
with paper and ink: but I hope to come unto you, and to speak face to face, that your joy may be made full.

contents.verseText: The children of thine elect sister salute thee.
contents: The children of thine elect sister salute thee.

_warnings: Trailing spaces present at line end.
Consecutive use of empty paragraph markers.
Consecutive use of empty paragraph markers.
